cat_item.display_value: Enable PING functionality for Assignment Group

catalog_script_client.name: Set Assignment Group owner

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Enable PING functionality for Assignment Group">dcfaa31c475b2110a9b7057d826d43bc</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:00fba35c475b2110a9b7057d826d4361</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Assignment Group owner</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var groupRef = g_form.getReference("assignment_group", setOwner);
	
	
	function setOwner(group) {
		g_form.setValue("owner", group.manager);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-04 14:04:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>01e57f58479b2110a9b7057d826d436a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Assignment Group owner</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ping Services" source="x_670518_ping_serv">82262b54475b2110a9b7057d826d436f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ping Services">82262b54475b2110a9b7057d826d436f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_01e57f58479b2110a9b7057d826d436a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-04 14:06:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
